dynamic_line.yes: A scarred pirate officer distributes slates to equally seedy associates, they laugh and jeer among themselves in an unfamiliar language.  You orbit the group for moment, then the officer signals you over.  "Well, well,  didnt figure you for a bounty hunter.  Still have some death marks unclaimed here for you to choose from.
dynamic_line.no: Some sort of pirate crew is assembled around a table.  Its probably better if you dont even notice them.

responses.text: Lets just ignore that part of the bar for now.

dynamic_line: The pirate officer slides a slate across the table to you, it lists a number of bounties on local criminals and enforcers.  "Take your pick, they are all scum."
